Module: main/attr

main/attr

  • main/attr.js, line 30

Requires

Methods

<static> attr(attr, value) → {this|String}

Set or get attribute.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
attr String | Object
value String | Number <optional>
Source:
  • main/attr.js, line 172
Returns:
Type
this | String
Example
$("#img").attr({
  width: "100px",
  height: "100px"
}).attr("title", "Flower");
$("#div1").attr("title", "Hello");
$("#div2").attr("title", "World");
$("#div1, #div2").attr("title"); // return "Hello"

<static> getVal(ele) → {String}

Exception select, checkbox, radio.
If select is multiple choice, then return "America|England"

<static> setVal(ele, value) → {this}

Exception select, checkbox, radio.
If select is multiple choice and value equals inner HTML of one element.
Parameters:
Name Type Description
ele Element
value String | Boolean | Number
